text: Candy is a 1968 sex comedy movie. The movie is a series of pornographic stories related to high school students. Ewa Aulin plays Candy. Ringo Starr plays Emanuel. Walter Matthau and Marlon Brando are also in the movie. Candy was released in December 1968. The reviews were mostly positive. Its box office intake was good. == Other websites == * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies
title: Candy (1968 movie)
